func.title: GetPlayerName

param.name: player
param.desc: Number of the player whose name to get.

func.desc: Returns the name of a player. If the specified player number is invalid, nil is returned. Thus this function can also be used to determine whether a player of a given number exists.
func.remark: In 9.0 OC this function was discontinued, because it can be retrieved from a player directly with GetPlayer and GetName or via the proplist property "Name".
